Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 14 Aug 2018If you wanna buy monthly, then RSPs and DCA would be the best with the least effort and monitoring. 
If you wanna accumulate the money and buy intermittently, and have more time to do research and monitor prices, then you could buy 1 - 2 stock positions every year. 
Other instruments like fixed deposits, short term endowments, (good quality) corporate bonds are also worth considering when the opportunities come up. 0 comments0
